briefTitle: Plant Extracted Natural Compounds Impact on Stage IV Breast Cancer Survival Time and Remission.
officialTitle: Stage IV Breast Cancer Gene Expression Control Using Micro-Trace and Plant Extracted Natural G.R.A.S. (Generally Accepted As Safe), Compounds in Adjunct Therapy Alongside Conventional Cancer Protocols
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Utilize GRAS plant extracted compounds for suppression of cancer-cell replication.
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Diagnosis of prostate, breast, or uterine cancer

  * Early or late stage disease
* Currently waiting to initiate conventional therapy or radiotherapy OR receiving concurrent conventional chemotherapy or radiation therapy
* Hormone receptor status not specified

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Menopausal status not specified

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* See Disease Characteristics
* Prior or concurrent chemotherapy or hormonal therapy for cancer allowed
